com.github.parboiled1.grappa.helpers
Interface ValueBuilder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the value produced
@Experimental
public interface ValueBuilder<T>

A value builder for use in a parser

Note that all setters should return a boolean, since the primary use of this interface is within rules. If the grammar rules are not enough for validation, you may make the setter return false to signal a parsing error.

This is also the base interface used by EventBusParser to post events.

See Also:
EventBusParser.post(ValueBuilder)

Method Summary
 T build()
          Build the value
 boolean reset()
          Reset this builder to a pristine state
 

Method Detail

build

@Nonnull
T build()
Build the value

Returns:
the built value

reset

boolean reset()
Reset this builder to a pristine state

When this method has been called, all injected values are lost and cannot be relied upon anymore.

Note that this interface makes no guarantee as to how build() behaves with an empty value builder.

Returns:
always true
